trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.ControlType.Document" /> control types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Przedstawia <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.ControlType.Document" /> kontrolować typów do automatyzacji interfejsu użytkownika.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer> represents documents and supports the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer> Reprezentuje dokumentów i obsługuje <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.

trans-unit.source: Objects such as a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> can contain embedded objects, such as images and hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: Obiekty, takie jak <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> lub <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> mogą zawierać osadzonych obiektów, takich jak obrazy i hiperłącza.

trans-unit.source: Initially, when you try to get the child elements of the document, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> does not return the embedded objects.
trans-unit.target: Początkowo podczas próby pobrania podrzędnych elementów dokumentu, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> nie może zwracać obiekty osadzone.

trans-unit.source: To get the embedded elements, obtain a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> and call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać osadzone elementy, należy uzyskać <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> z <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> i Wywołaj <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is called, any elements in that <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> are returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Po <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> jest nazywany elementów w tym <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> są zwracane przez <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Unless you know the document is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, you should not call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.DocumentRange%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli nie znasz dokumentu jest <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, nie należy wywołać <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.DocumentRange%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> właściwości.

trans-unit.source: If the document is loaded from a network location, calling <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> on the entire document is resource intensive.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli dokument został załadowany z lokalizacji sieciowej, wywoływania <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> w całym dokumencie jest zasobem znacznym.

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should use one of the methods on <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> that returns a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> that represents a portion of the document.
trans-unit.target: Zamiast niej, powinny używać jednej z metod na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> zwracającą <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> reprezentujący części dokumentu.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> Skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> klasy.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera typ kontrolki dla formantu, który jest skojarzony z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda jest wywoływana przez <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Text" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Text" /> we wszystkich przypadkach.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that represents the screen coordinates of the element that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> reprezentujący współrzędne ekranu elementu, który jest skojarzony z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda jest wywoływana przez <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Prostokąt ograniczający.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera kolekcję elementów podrzędnych dla <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda jest wywoływana przez <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

trans-unit.source: Because <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> gives access to its content through <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern" />, this method always returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Ponieważ <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> zapewnia dostęp do jego zawartości za pomocą <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern" />, ta metoda zawsze zwraca <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera nazwę <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda jest wywoływana przez <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "Document".
trans-unit.target: Ciąg, który zawiera "Dokument".

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> that represents the clickable space that is on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> reprezentujący aktywne miejsca, która znajduje się na <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda jest wywoływana przez <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The point that represents the clickable space that is on the element.
trans-unit.target: Punkt, który reprezentuje aktywne ilości miejsca, która znajduje się na elemencie.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Jedna z wartości wyliczenia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wzorzec kontroli <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Text" />, this method returns an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli <paramref name="patternInterface" /> jest <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Text" />, ta metoda zwraca <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> is understood by the end user as interactive or the user might understand the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia wartość wskazującą, czy <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> jest rozpoznawany przez użytkownika końcowego jako interaktywnego lub użytkownik może zrozumieć <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> jako przyczyniające się do formantu w strukturylogicznej[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda jest wywoływana przez <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> we wszystkich przypadkach.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość wskazującą, czy <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> wyłączeniu ekranu.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen" />.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda jest wywoływana przez <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Jeśli element nie jest na ekranie; w przeciwnym razie <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: Ta właściwość wskazuje, czy element jest widoczny.

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: W niektórych sytuacjach element znajduje się na ekranie, ale jest nadal niewidoczny.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład jeśli element jest zasłonięty przez inne elementy, jego może nie być widoczna.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: W tym przypadku metoda zwraca `false`.
